Interesting documentary...
Many Thanx to TvTeam and Kata for a Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
How does this compare to the 720p tv rip I know the quality wont be as good but was there more added to the dvd version

I was the editor & co-creater of GASLAND -- this is the superior version of the movie, although I don't support this particular dissemination of the film.

Please please, buy the DVD if you are impacted by the movie.  We are dedicated to the cause and the families that this epidemic affects. 

Support true independent filmmaking -- we are moving towards a constructive solution.

Become a part of the 21st century energy solution. Let's shake things up and get things moving. 

gaslandthemovie.com
@gasland, I am downloading this because it is the only access I have to the movie. Is there somewhere I can donate money?

@mwake just go on the website gasland gave and you'll have a link to donate.

Or go there : https://org2.democracyinaction.org/o/6791/t/10276/p/salsa/donation/common/public/?donate_page_KEY=2236
We should all donate to the film maker when we download something like this. This is not in the same category as a Hollywood blockbuster, that has been bankrolled by millionaires.
I agree about a donation being appropriate. What is a fair thing here? I mean how much? Just a guideline would be helpful.

@Ricchh: Well, DVDs go for, what? $20 these days? That's what I would go with. But if you're as ricchh as your name implies you are, perhaps you could toss 'em a benjamin... I dunno... I don't have an income, so it's hard for me to gauge these things...
